text: Great staff, very friendly and affordable payments. Dr. Mann takes great care of my back and really corrects the issues!

name: Debra Thomsen
text: Dr Brian has the brightest smile and healing knowledge. Chelsea has the most wonderful greeting and is able to work in appointments for those aches and pains. Heath is so helpful and clear on his instructions on the table. Those hot pads are the best. You won’t go wrong getting adjustments for your back, hips and knees from Advanced Chiropractor!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review! See you next time!!!

name: mark mcalister
text:
I would stay away extremely overpriced. It was $235 for a new patient set up every visit after would be $99. The exam was minimal, no new x-rays and didn't even look at my old ones before slapping me with the bill. For chiropractic care this is egregious.
After this visit i went to another practice new patient was $30 which included x-rays and a much more thorough examination.

resp.text: Good Morning! $18 is our average patient copay!  If you have questions on what your price would be please call us at 2563518500 so we can give you correct quotes.  Also, our exam guidelines follow both that of the Journal of the American Medical Association and the Journal of Chiropractic Medicine ensuring we deliver complete and thorough examinations every time! X-rays should only be taken on an as needed basis. If a chiropractor is taking x-rays on all patients without medical necessity we urge you to report this to the State Board of Chiropractic as this is either based on greed or severely outdated research and considered below the current standard of care. In all honesty, we believe this to be a fake review left by a competing Decatur chiropractor as the information in your comment is misleading and inaccurate.

name: R Mitchell
text: Dr. Mann helped me with my back pain.  I had been getting worse and worse for months and I was having to miss work.  Everyone here is always nice and my back feels strong and pain free again. Thank you

resp.text: So happy to hear you were pleased with your care at Advanced Chiropractic Mr. Mitchell.  See you next time!

name: Casey Miller
text: Dr. Mann was exactly what is looking for when I was searching for something to help with my back pain. My other doctor just wanted me to take pills and then an orthopedic surgeon said I need an operation.  I didn't want any of that so I went here. The staff is very nice and the Dr. Mann is very professional.  He said even though I was in severe pain that he could still help me. Sure enough here I am now doing everything I need to without any pain. It has been 2 weeks since I have been.  I am   Thankful and grateful. Definitely recommend this office.

resp.text: We are so glad you found us Casey! See you soon!!!

name: Dana Bradley
text: Incredibly appreciative for all the help I received here.  I didn't make it here until after a month of muscle relaxers and an MRI.  I was scheduled for an appointment with my orthopedic doctor but my appointment was 6 weeks away.  I was really just looking for something to hold me over.  I took my report to Dr. Mann and I was told not only could help me he believed he could keep me from having any surgery and possibly no more meds.  I had my doubts, especially after he told me I had a disc in my lower back that was bulging.  To my delight, I began sleeping better each day.  After 2 weeks work wasn't so bad.  After 1 month I felt so much better I cancelled my orthopedic visit.  I don't know why the chiropractor isn't everyone's first recommendation when something hurts.

resp.text: We are so glad we could help you Mrs. Bradley!  We hope you are well and look forward to seeing you and your family in the future!!!

name: Brylee Young
text: Really nice people. Super great and very helpful. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Brylee! Hope you have a great day!

name: Luke Appleton
text: Highly reccomend this office to anyone trying to avoid pills and surgery for their back pain.  My back had steadily gotten worse and had reached a point that I couldn't take it anymore.  It hurt at work and as affecting my sleep.  Went to my MD and they just gave me a prescription. I'm not a pill head so I looked this place up.  Very little wait time here. I sat for less than 5 minutes waiting the whole visit. Sat for about 30 at my MD.  I used Dr. Mann here.  He went over what was going on.  I recieved treatment that day.  I had no idea how much sitting in a bad chair could affect my back.  I have since conpleted my rehab and feel great.  Even better than before it started bothering me.  Definitley worth the visit.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review Luke! We are glad you had such great results during your time here! We strive to be leaders in rehabilitation and wellness care!  See you next time!

text: My headaches and low back pain are gone!  I used to get headaches regularly. They weren’t usually debilitating but they were constantly there and just annoying. I would find myself in a bad mood just from the pain always being there. My lower back started after I had my child and I just couldn’t get it to go away. I found this place online and they were able to get me in the same day. My wait times are always very short at advanced chiropractic. I cannot stand going to an office and sitting for an hour waiting.  I think my longest wait was less than 10 minutes.  The office is very clean- they clean between every patient. They also take blue cross blue shield insurance which was great. I’m hoping to get my husband in soon for neck issues he had after a car accident.  Overall very pleased with my care here and happy to support local business in Decatur!

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review Autumn!  We love that you have had such great results!  Let Mr. Troxel know we deal with a lot of auto accident victims and have great success! See you next time!

name: Robin Varner
text: I would recommend Advanced Chiropractic to everyone!  The staff is so  nice!  I came for back pain.  Dr. Mann was patient and kind.  He walked me through everything and made sure I understood what my problem was.  I felt 100 percent better after finishing here.

name: Gabby Rochester
text: Great clinic! Great hours too super convenient. I was having pain in my back and down my leg. I started this week and can already tell the difference! I have received great adjustments, some home exercises, and decompression therapy. Front desk was very accommodating, the doctor was very insightful and showed me why I’ve had so many problems with my back! I was especially impressed with the suggestions Dr. Mann gave me to avoid flare ups and actually help me fix why it was happening instead of just living at the chiropractor forever.  I also purchased their holiday massage special. It’s a 3 pack of one hour massages for $99. Can’t beat it! It’s always a little nerve racking to try a different doctor but I’m so glad I chose this place on my google search! Five stars for sure!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review Gabby! Glad to here you have had such great success! Thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Tiffany Hightower
text: Dr. Mann and the staff are amazing! The best chiropractor I have been to. Dr. Mann worked with me for a couple of weeks and now I feel much better! I would highly recommend them to anyone. Also Kelsey and Heath are the best! Everyone is always in a great mood! I love it!

resp.text: Thank you Tiffany! We always enjoy seeing you at the office.  So glad to hear that you had success with our practice!  Have a great day!

name: Jennifer Landry
text: Dr. Mann is a great chiropractor.  It looks like it's been said her a 100 times but I wanted to say why my treatments here allow me to say how much I mean that and miss being in Alabama!  I spend most of the year in Atlanta now because of work.  I have tried and tried to find a chiropractor here that was as good as Dr. Mann but I haven't been successful.  I called Dr. Mann before one of my appointments in Atlanta and asked if he would mind talking to my chiropractor (bless him for doing that) Even after an in depth conversation about the type of treatments I was receiving with Dr. Mann in Decatur I still wasn't getting the same level of relief from my Atlanta chiropractor that I was receiving at Advanced Chiropractic.  My neck is just not the same when I go to other places.  I only get to be adjusted a few times a year by Dr. Mann now because of the move and it's one of the worst things about not being home.  But every time  I am in town seeing Dr. Mann is on the list!  Another thing I always appreciated about Dr. Mann's office is there is always a plan.  He doesn't just say 'see ya' at the end of your appointment.  If I am working on an injury I always know when I need to be seen again.  If I am on wellness I know I need to be back monthly.  Other places I have been don't give any direction and it just seems less professional.  Be thankful for what you have here!!! He's the best! Thanks again Dr. Mann!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jennifer for leaving us a review! We always asked to be updated by your family when they come in for treatment about what you and yours are up to these days!  It sounds like the husband and kids are  adjusting to the move pretty well! We miss seeing you guys every month now that you've moved to Atlanta!  And yes anytime you are home give us a call and we will work your whole gang in.  Hope to see you soon!!!

name: nathanael west
text: This is a great place to get adjusted! They are friendly and make you feel welcome! I started going a couple months ago and I feel great! I suggest you give them a call!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. West for taking the time to leave a review!  We are thrilled to hear that you had such a positive experience with Advanced Chiropractic!  We look forward to seeing you in the future.  Have a great day!!!

name: Miles Blackwell
text: This is the chiropractor you've been looking for.  I'm a fan of all things wellness and am a believer that the chiropractor can save you from surgery. I am also very picky about the places I go for treatment and advice. I had just relocated to the area for work.  My supervisor had also just moved here and said I should give this place a try.  I called ahead and asked about the services provided and some questions about my new insurance.  I had my appointment that evening.  The office is more modern looking than some of the other places in town (past experience has taught me sometimes old building means outdated doctor). The staff and doctors are all nice people and I can without a doubt say that was the best treatment I have ever been given.  My last chiropractor was a good friend and great person but was a smaller build. Just guessing but I think that really was the difference in treatments and let me tell you it was significant. I come in about once a month and it keeps me doing everything I like (and some of the chores that I don't).

resp.text: Thanks for the review Miles!  We work hard to make sure we maintain a professional environment and stay up to date on the latest research on wellness and rehab treatments.  Thank you again for taking the time to leave us a review!!! See you soon!

name: Tiffany Nichole
text: I haven't felt this good in a long time! No more pain! No more headaches! Going to work isn't so painful anymore. I'm getting much better sleep at night. I can do just about anything I want to now. I'm not afraid to tackle a garden or the laundry! I'm so glad I gave this place a try. In the very first visit I could see the difference. After a few weeks I felt like a new person. I originally only came here because I had just moved to Decatur and driving to my old chiropractor was getting to be a hassle. On my first visit Dr. Mann discussed new treatment methods that he had seen some success with and I decided to give the rehab a try before just going to my regular Wellness treatments. Like I said in just a couple weeks I could see the changes. I used 2 feel tingling from my back almost weekly. I now haven't felt it in weeks. I used to have to avoid certain Hobbies that I enjoyed because I was afraid my back would go out. Thanks to Doctor Mann I now have no fear of my back going out on me. That in itself is huge for me! And yes this office is super convenient! Right on the Beltline across from publix!!!

resp.text: Thanks Tiffany! We are glad we were able to help you!

name: Keisha Talley
text: My son and I come here for chiropractic treatment.  The front desk is always stellar and I have great trust in Dr. Mann. We always come her first for any pains or injuries we might have.

resp.text: Thanks Keisha for leaving us a review!

name: Rachael Gardner
text: Wonderful and nice people and they helped my back significantly

resp.text: Thank you so much Rachael for taking the time to  leaving us a review.  We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your results at Advanced Chiropractic!  See you next time!

name: Jamie Reynolds
text: Just finished my visit and I am very impressed. Office was very easy to find. It’s on the Beltline in Decatur. No long wait, very nice staff. My appointment with the doctor went well. Dr. Mann is very friendly and approachable. He answered all my questions and we were able to start my treatment today.  Looking forward to coming back tomorrow when he says we will go over my x-rays together.  My copay was only $20 with my insurance. Already feel a little better! Looking forward to getting a good night of sleep!

resp.text: So glad you had a good experience! Thank you Jamie for leaving us a review and thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Blaine Roberts
text: I love going to Advanced Chiropractic the staff is extremely nice and very helpful. They are also quite knowledgeable about the products they offer. The atmosphere is very enjoyable and the massage therapist is excellent as well. One of the best chiropractic offices I’ve ever been too.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope to see you soon Mr. Roberts! Have a great day!

name: Danny McGee
text:
I originally came here because of the office hours. I don't get off till 4:30.
My old chiropractors office wanted me there by 4:45 to be seen. Advanced Chiropractic is open till 6:00.
I must say I have been very pleased with the switch. I highly recommend Dr. Mann! When I first came here I was contemplating another back surgery. Dr Mann ,through adjustments and suggestions on exercises, has improved my quality of life.  My job can be physically demanding at times. Dr Mann keeps me going! I have never had a problem getting an appointment when I have had a bad day. His office staff are friendly and helpful. The massage therapist is great to.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review! It had been a pleasure having you join our office.

name: Jonathan Franks
text: I was pretty happy with my chiropractor back home so finding a new place was not the most exciting thing for me.  I had been using the same chiropractor that my parents introduced me to when I was was young so I wanted to find the right doctor for me and my family.  I moved to Alabama as part of the construction happening in Madison right now and will be here for at least a year.  I found this place on google and called to schedule a consultation.  The office was nice. Front desk was helpful. Dr. Mann was very  professional and gave me the same level of treatment I was used to getting in back in Tennessee.  He also had some new ideas that were actually very helpful at work.  The machinery I sometimes use put me in bad positions and could flare me up for days. I’m a golfer too and he is going to try and get me back on the course.  My swing has been causing some radiating back pain in to my leg.  This place also works out with my schedule. I don’t get off of work until 5 sometimes but can still make it to the office since they are opening until 6. I’ll Be trying the massage therapist soon too.

text:
Started here for my back issues.  I really thought I got it from my dad but Dr. Mann said a lot of it has to do with lifestyle as well.  I had great results here.  Instant relief, followed by weeks of improvement.  Visits never took that long- barely sat in the waiting room before me treatment begins and I was moved to the next parts of my treatment were with little to no wait.  At the end I did have a few question but Dr. Mann stayed with me to answer my questions.  Nothing beats being able to sleep, wake up, go through a demanding day, and still feel great every day.  I will most definitely keep using Dr. Mann and his clinic on a regular basis.

Update 12/23/19-  It has been months since I have had even the slightest pain! I am back to exercising 3 days a week and doing pretty much anything I want, pain free.  I honestly have had days that I forgot that I was ever in pain all the time.  My son's basketball season started up which means lots of driving and uncomfortable locations I must linger in for hours, multiple nights a week.  With the instructions Dr. Mann gave me my back has held up and I have not missed a second of a single game.  They were able to work me in this morning for an adjustment before I hit the road for the holidays.  Dr. Mann even came out to my car to help me setup me seat cushion to keep my back from acting up on the long drive we have to my wife's family gathering in North Carolina.  I cannot say enough about how happy I am that I found Dr. Mann's office.   Until next time! Thanks again you guys! Have a Merry Christmas!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving the review!  We are so glad you have had such great results!  Chiropractic is great for many things!  We believe in keeping the body pain free and healthy so you can keep doing the things you love to do!  If we wait until pain arises then new damage has occurred and some parts of the body just don't grow back like the original pieces!  We are trying to change the narrative of health care by not only fixing the problem but preventing it from coming back as well. See you next time at Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Kris Small
text: Okay, So I've dealt with my back pain for many years I've seen chiropractors for many years and I am a licensed medical provider and I am honestly dismayed by this place, I told the D.C. what exactly was wrong and he ignored me. Attempted to realign a part of my body that didn't need it and when he was done after 6 minutes in the room with me he managed to not fix the issue at all now I'm out over $100.00 and absolutely  no relief for a simple pinched nerve, oh but he did set me up on the "maintenance plan" which is 3 visits a week at $65 per visit that's $780 a month! That's more then my mortgage for what every single other chiropractor has been able to fix and treat in one visit for under $50.00. Please be wise and heed this as a warning. I do not recommend this place for anyone. They may be a legal D.C. but it's as close to a scam ad you can get legally.

resp.text: Kris- you are being dishonest. Health expenses without insurance can be tough, but that is no excuse for your dishonesty in your review. Cameras show your time in the office was approximately 40 minutes; less than 5 minutes in the waiting room- standard for any first visit. Furthermore, we offer the lowest cash prices for new patients in town and also very flexible payment plans.  You were told the prices before you came in. Our cameras even show you were in high spirits until it was time to pay your bill.  And instead of talking to us and working out a payment plan we watched you go into your car and leave this angry review.  Also, what you tried to tell us was ‘wrong’ with you was actually incorrect and probably the main reason you’ve had to deal with your back pain for years instead of actullay being ‘fixed.’ While we have great respect for you and your field, you have to remember- you are not a doctor-  for instance a chiropractor in a car accident should heed the EMT’s instructions because that is what they have been trained to do.  You are also confusing your terminology- maintenance is for wellness patients- and is an optional once a month visit for those who have complete their ‘rehab’ plan to help stay ahead of injuries and reduce wear and tear on the body. Rehab plans are what you were trying to quote. Certain injuries take time to heal and a proper plan for recovery. You are absolutely right Kris- We do things different at Advanced Chiropractic.  We get so many patients who have seen chiropractors that take shortcuts to treat their injuries and the patient continues to deal with pain for years.  Our goal at Advanced Chiropractic is to HEAL the injury. We have found that if we simply make pain go away we are no different than a pain killer or opiate.  However, with our custom made rehabilitation plans you can escape that continued damage, year after year, which is so important as many parts of the body don’t grow back when you repeatedly injure them.

You are right proper movement is the key to wellness not just going through the motions!  And YES questions are great! They empower the patient! text: I recently visited advanced chiropractic for low back pain.  It was so bad I couldn't walk.  He took x-rays and found I have scoliosis.  With the exercises, adjustments, and therapies I received I am now walking pain free.  Very happy with my results

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review Marilyn! You are so sweet! And we are thrilled you are walking again! We love seeing you and look forward to helping you and your family!

text: I first came to this office when Dr. Clyde was here. I saw him for many years as he was a church friend. He chose Dr.Mann to take over the office. I am happy he did and I still come regularly to the office for all my aches and pains! Give them a call!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!  We see many of Dr. Fontes patients and love them all! We always strive to give the best care to our patients whether it is staying up to date on the latest research or simply taking the time to hear the patient say what they need to be heard.  I hope we can take care of all your health and wellness needs for years to come!

name: Greg Linderman
text: I was in an ugly car accident when I first came to see Dr. Mann.  I felt a little banged up right after the accident and then sore the next day.  The accident wasn't my fault so I decided to go make sure I was completely OK.  I went to Advanced Chiropractic and have had a great experience.  The front desk was very helpful. I saw the doctor quickly and had xrays taken that day. My soreness was from whiplash from my accident.  It took several weeks to get me back to 100 percent but I'm thankful I went here. I would recommend that anyone in a car accident go here ASAP for care you can trust.

resp.text: Thanks Greg for taking the time to leave this review!  Car accidents are a big deal! They wreck (no pun intended!) the body head to toe!  Even if you don't initially have any pain that doesn't mean there isn't any damage.  Being hit by a 1000lb object even at 5 mph does serious damage to the body.

name: Justin Fagan
text: I came here on a whim never have been to a chiropractor before and i must say that the experience that i received when i walked through the door was nothing short of excellent. Whitney was great and extremely helpful with getting me set up and taken care of especially at a last min call and Gia also done a wonderful job takin care of Me in conjunction with Whitney.. I see Dr Manns name quite often over social media and when you google chiropractor its one of the first to pop up and theres a reason one of the most professional individuals I've ever met , explained everything he was doing to a t and offered mounds of information for things that he had found with my back .. greatly recommend Dr Mann and his staff to get you situated .

name: Mrs Lamb
text: I came because of my severe neck pain. I feel so much better now! They gave me neck exercise, neck decompression, and adjustments. Now I am a wellness patient. Love this place and the staff! Give them a call!

resp.text: Mrs. Lamb we are so glad we could help! Keep up the good work! And thank you for the review! It helps us get the word out!

name: Wade Dinsmore
text: Dr. Mann is wonderful and his staff is so courteous and kind.  Some places treat you like a number, not a living breathing person, and this is a welcomed change.  I recommend them to all who are looking for a change.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Tammy Burkett
text: Dr.  Mann and staff were great. I was nervous about going to a chiropractor as I am one who tends to tense up when past chiropractors twist my on my neck.  Avoided going to chiropractor for that very reason. However,  Dr.  Mann made me feel at ease and was able to do adjustments and treatments without having to do any twisting.

resp.text: So glad you had such great results!

name: kelsey johnson
text: I was having back pain and decided it was finally time to do something about it.  So I did my Google search and found this to be a very popular place. They accepted my blue cross blue sheild insurance too so that was nice.  They were able to work me in the next day. My first appointment was less than an hour.   All my worries were examined and questions answered. I even recieved treatment in that hour. The next day they had my entire care plan cost on paper including how long it would most likely take to meet my goals. My next visits were less than 30 minutes in the office TOTAL.  That's fantastic considering my eye appointments go for about 90! I just finished my first week of rehab and I'm already noticing improvement! Definitely pleased so far and will be  recommending to my friends and family!!!

resp.text: Thanks Kelsey!  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave us a review! So glad to hear that you are having good results!  We always want to see results within 2 weeks to make sure your individually made care plan is effective!  We look forward to seeing you again and meeting your family! Have a great week!!!

name: Cory Truett
text: Dr. Mann is an extremely knowledgeable and sincere chiropractor. All the way from his thorough exam from when I first came in, to the recovery plan he put me, he has been amazing. I highly recommend a visit if you haven't been yet.

resp.text: Thanks Cory!

name: Kellie Terry
text: What a great experience!  Everyone was so nice from the moment you walk in.  The facility is clean and modern looking.  Dr Mann gave me some exercises for my neck that really seem to help.

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Terry!

name: Sarah Killian
text: I get really bad headaches. I’ve tried over the counter medicine and it did nothing. Went to a specialist and after several weeks still no significant results. Went to a holistic doctor- still nothing. I had been diagnosed with everything from migraines to fibromyalgia. A friend of mine told me to try her Chiropractor because she had great results for her low back. They take insurance (I didn’t know that at the time) so that was helpful. My first visit I Came in and the front desk was very helpful. I soon met Dr. Mann and after listening to my history he took some x-rays. He examined them and decided it was safe to begin treatment. Said what I actually had was a cervicogenic headache and that he was confident we could reduce the number of headaches I was having.  Within the week my headaches were almost totally gone. After two weeks of no headaches I am now down to just monthly visits to make sure they don’t come back. My only regret is that I didn’t go sooner. Thanks Dr. Mann!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us for your healthcare needs Ms. Killian!  Headaches can be the biggest pain (no pun intended) .  I'm glad our team here at Advanced Chiropractic was able to get you sleeping and working like normal again.  We enjoy every visit with you!  Good luck with the new job and we'll see you soon!!!

name: Terri Richards
text: I came for shoulder and neck pain.  You never spend much time waiting here! The front desk is very kind, and Dr. Mann does a lot more than just crackin bones!  I also received exercises, stretches, and ergonomics tips for self treating at home.  He showed ways to tackle things differently so that I don't keep reinjuring myself.  I also keep doing my exercises that I was given to keep going pain free.  Tight shoulders are gone too!  I was skeptical at first because I had never been to a chiropractor before but the pain and even the numbness are completely gone now.  I really appreciate all the help! I'll probably try their massage therapist next! Highly recommend to anyone who tired of being achy and in pain!!!

resp.text: We are glad you had a good experience Terri!  Neck and shoulder pain is extremely common now and many people just ignore it!  Our rehabilitation program and ergonomics coaching is a major part to our success!  We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: TruArchery (Brandon Truss)

We are good friends now and have known each other for a long time. This is place you want to go for your healthcare! My wife and her mother also go here. They like getting massages from the therapist and seeing Dr. Mann on the same visit.  Now that I am pain free my visits now include nutritional counseling so I can learn to healthy and shed a little weight. This place really does it all!

resp.text: Thanks Brandon!

I felt like that was pretty good since I had to fill out some paperwork since it was my first visit.  They said my future visits will be 30 minutes or less.  The visit cost about $20 with me insurance.  Dr. Mann seems very 'up to date' in his field.  Also, the building is very easy to find since it is right on the beltline. Overall very impressed so far!!!

resp.text: Ms. Sartain it was a pleasure to meet you today!  We are so glad you had a pleasant experience in our office today! Thank you again for choosing Advanced Chiropractic for your rehab and wellness needs!!!

text: DO NOT LET THIS MAN TOUCH YOU!!!! I've been going to chiropractor for 10 years have always felt much better afterwards. After leaving his office I've been in bed for days from pain. I will be getting my x-rays that he took and take them to a different chiropractor to see what he messed up.

resp.text:
Hi Ashley, we believe you have mistakenly reviewed the wrong office- we have no record of an Ashley Smith ever being treated in our facility. At Advanced Chiropractic, our patients' x-rays are always reviewed with the doctor on the first visit before treatment begins to ensure a safe, quick recovery.  'First do no harm' is a rule we strictly adhere to- as should all doctors. We are so sorry you received a poor standard of care at another clinic. Please give us a call at (256)351-8500 and we will help you recover from the injury you have endured.
Also, when you retrieve the x-rays from the other office you visited we'll review them for no charge- just mention this post..

name: Allen Blood
text:
The staff was very knowledgeable in the techniques that allowed me to progress quickly and easily in my rehab. Even with multiple members helping me over several months, they were all on the same page where my progress was and what the next steps were to be taken. They are light hearted and seem to enjoy their work and the interaction with those that need their help.
I would definitely recommend TherapySouth Vestavia to anyone who needs physical therapy after surgery or injury!

name: Susan Johnson
text: Therapy South has been my favorite place to be since my rotator cuff surgery.  When I arrived there I could not even touch the top of my head, style my hair, or other daily things we take for granted. My surgery humbled me; these therapists motivated me, encouraged me, and made me feel that I could accomplish anything!  My doctors goals seemed unattainable, but with the help of Hannah, Laura, Patrick, both Allans, Jo and Nate, I achieved my goals in five months! With encouragement when I was discouraged, praise when I did well, and personal attention to me, I began to feel a close bond with these gifted people. I began to feel like they were “family,” so when I left today it was bittersweet. I’m proud I met my goals, but sad to leave all of these sweet friends I have made! They not only helped me heal my body, but my spirit and soul. There aren’t enough words to say “Thank you” to the people who gave me my mobility back! I will definitely pop in to visit when I go to Publix!!

resp.text: Great job Susan! We are so proud of you and thankful that you are now part of the TherapySouth family 🙂! We wish you the best!

name: Larry Stone
text:
Today was my last day of PT at Therapy South. My experience at this facility was phenomenal. Everyone was such a professional and friendly and I feel that they became my friends. They also can work as a team to adjust to your needs. I would definitely use this group again but hope I won’t need to.
A special shout out to Armin who put up with me and got my shoulder ( after 2 surgeries) back in great shape.

name: Pary Payne
text:
Everyone here was very kind, friendly, professional, and just down to earth good people. I spent six months doing PT at Therapy South in 2020 after a Mountain Bike wreck and a couple surgery’s on my left shoulder (2 metal plates and 19 screws). I mostly worked with Armin who is great and knows his stuff, but spent enough time there to get to know everyone and they all know their stuff. Really Great people that I highly recommend.

Thank You guys and gals!!

- Daniel Payne

name: Laurie Carey
text: I used Therapy South for some neck/shoulder pain that was also causing a lot of numbness and tingling in my arm, hand, and fingers. From the moment I scheduled my first appointment I had a positive experience. Ryan worked efficiently and communicated well and I always felt comfortable to ask questions and be honest about what I was feeling. The entire staff is friendly and welcoming and work to make the environment and experience positive for their patients.

name: Lilly Welch
text: My experience with TherapySouth Vestavia was wonderful! I came in with a bad sprain from a dance related injury, and Ryan got me up and dancing again in no time! The whole staff is friendly and welcoming, and it is clear that they want you to succeed and get stronger. Ryan was incredibly kind and thorough and made sure that I felt 100% before walking out the door after my last appointment. On top of all of that, they maintained wonderful protocols to help prevent the spread of COVID-19. I felt very safe during my time at the clinic. You can not go wrong with TherapySouth and Ryan!

text: I've been to Therapy South for several sports injuries over the past 2 years.  Armin has done a great job fixing my knee, neck and leg adductor problems. I highly recommended Therapy South in Vestavia.  The entire staff is friendly and helpful.

text: Alan Spooner is the best physical therapist I have ever been to. He cares about his patients and their progress. He's very patient and has always helped me get better with treatment. The facility is clean, has an upbeat atmosphere and parking is easy. All of the employees at TherapySouth in Vestavia are very friendly and helpful making every visit as enjoyable as possible. I'm sure I'll have other PT needs in the months, years to come and I will always come to this location even though there are other TherapySouth facilities that are closer in location to me.

name: Jenny Hebert
text: My experience at TherapySouth Vestavia was excellent.  My therapist, Armin Hornikel, worked with me after a hip surgery, and then several months later for some foot issues.  He always listened to me, never got tired of my questions, and encouraged me to do my best.  He was very good at explaining how the muscles, bones, tendons, and ligaments all worked together and why I needed to do certain exercises to improve my condition.  One of the things I appreciated most was his sense of humor that always left me feeling a little bit lighter each time I left.  Everyone on the staff at TherapySouth Vestavia was friendly and gave me encouragement when I needed it most.  I highly recommend this group.

resp.text: Thank you Jenny!

name: Garrick Stone
text: After surgery for a broken hip, from a cycling accident, I was referred to TherapySouth Vestavia for rehab/PT. Alan Spooner,  Armin Hornikel and the Vestavia team all took exceptional care of me. The team had goals for each visit and pushed me to meet and exceed them. The team also provided me, and other patients, with abundant amounts of (much needed) encouragement with each visit. I had a great experience with the Vestavia team and would recommend them to anyone needing physical therapy services.

text: I have had a long road of recovery with multiple knee surgeries. Vestavia Therapy South has been a huge source of help and constant support for me through a long process. I am grateful to have them on my side and I will absolutely suggest them to others and use them again for my own family. Thank you, Therapy South Vestavia, for being so wonderful!

name: Sydney Newsom
text: Being in pain with your mobility hindered can be a very helpless feeling. From the moment I walked in the door here, I knew they were going to take care of me. Everyone you come in contact with is so warm and friendly. My PT, Hannah, was amazing. Unfortunately, I ended up having surgery but when I start back with PT, I won't go anywhere else. I'm partial to Hannah but feel confident that all of the therapists there are competent and caring. The wonderful reviews are all genuine and true. I feel so lucky to have easy access to this location.

name: Ashley Grisham
text: TherapySouth saved my ski trip! Last year I had debilitating pain in my right knee which my doctor had diagnosed as arthritis. But Hannah at TherapySouth Vestavia was not convinced. She determined that it was muscular and began treating me with manual therapy and dry needling. When I first saw her, I was 6 weeks away from a snow ski trip, so our goal was to get me into a condition to ski without pain. Not only did she do that (my trip was AWESOME) but she gave me tips about stretches and exercises I could do at home. Now my knee is completely pain free! I'm so thankful to TherapySouth for their knowledge, compassion and dedication to patient wellness. I highly recommend this practice.

name: David Powell
text: I selected this location of TherapySouth based on their convenient location.  My treatment there could not have been better.  The entire team was helpful, engaging, and caring.  They helped me get my medical issue under control, equipped me with strategies to continue to manage it, and built relationships at the same time.  If you need physical therapy and want a place that is not only convenient, but also has people that care about you as a person as well as a patient, I’d recommend TherapySouth-Vestavia.

name: Victoria Morrison
text: Great people and excellent care! TherapySouth made physical therapy enjoyable to go to and helped with a speedy recovery getting back to what I love. Would recommend to everyone!

name: Melody Warbington
text: I've been to TherapySouth (Vestavia) several times in the last 2-3 years due to knee and shoulder issues, and most recently saw Hannah Cox for my knee after a fall. A few sessions later, and the twinge and pain is gone. Then, I saw Hannah with the hope that a few sessions would delay getting frozen shoulder again, or at least put off getting a shot from my ortho until it had been a year. Therapy + dry needling worked wonders. Hannah and the entire staff are professional, friendly, and they worked hard to make me feel relaxed even when working through the pain, stiffness, and soreness I was experiencing. If you need therapy, this is the place to go!

name: Yvonne Fenoglio
text:
I was having some hip pain and could barely get out of bed  let alone walk. I came to PT Solutions thinking Dry Needling was the only thing that would help (I have had it before and knew that would be a good quick fix). Then I met AJ. He assessed me, got me on the table, showed me some stretches and gave me a quick dry needling devised a customized  plan for me. SO for the next few sessions I went tp PT, and started to feel some relief.After about a week I really noticed the pain relief and started noticing some strength! We started tapering the visits and increasing my strength building at each session. Before long I was able to lift weights and do things that I thought I would never be able to and (somethings I had never done before). Now I am on my own having completed my PT and feeling so much stronger! The encouragement from AJ, and the customer service from all really help with my great experience and my healing! Thank you PT Solutions East. You all are the best. I would Highly Recommend them!
Clean, professional and Knowledgeable.

resp.text: Yvonne, it was a please working with you. It always helps when patients put in the hard work. I’m glad you enjoyed your experience at PT Solutions!

name: Donald Scott
text: I have had back pain for many years. The Doctor I was using at the time, said surgery was my only option. After several years of dealing with the pain, I went to another back Doctor. He x-rayed and sent me for a new MRI. He told me there was no need for surgery and set me up with PT Solutions East for physical therapy. Within the first three visits, the pain was all but gone. Over the next couple of weeks of therapy, the lower back pain totally disappeared. My back pain was due to core muscle weakening. Not only has my back pain gone, but my balance and poster has greatly improved. The staff has worked and taught me how to tighten up my core muscles and also taught me how to keep them that way. The staff at PT Solutions East are great to work with, are caring and genuinely interested in helping you get better.

resp.text: Thanks Don, I’m so glad up enjoyed your experience and that we were able to help with your back pain!

text: The entire staff is awesome!!  So friendly everyone is always smiling and very helpful.  Jonathan, Aston & Bo & the entire staff really have helped me get back to my exercise routine which is very vital to me.  They push me each visit and I push myself!!  I am very grateful!!  They are very professional and know how to get you moving the correct way!!  I cannot tell you how much that means to me!!  Thanks again!!

name: Jerry Ross
text: My second time to be treated at Therapy South (shoulder first and back this time) and I couldn’t be more pleased with the results.   Problems corrected with no surgery and no drugs and that was my goal.   Wonderful, knowledgeable staff that makes you feel so welcome.   I highly recommend Therapy South based on me experience.

name: Joyce Parker
text: I did 6 weeks of therapy for pain in my back, which had been bothering me  for 8 months. All the therapists who worked with me were informative and helpful, and very patient. The atmosphere at Chelsea is calm and relaxing. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea.  My pain is 99% better!

name: Danielle Gardner
text: I have known Robbie since my daughter went to him for many knee & ankle issues as a competitive athlete. Then came me with multiple issues with my ankle, leg, and hip issues. Robbie truly takes time consulting with his patients and getting them back to their daily tasks. With my multiple sclerosis and falls, I needed help getting me stable again. It took a long time and still going to him as needed, but he gives you the individual time you need. When he isn't there, he makes sure that he places you with another PT that can give you the skills & exercises that you need. Also, he helps you to have exercises thru Therapy South online portal when you are done with your therapy sessions to make sure you are continuing improving at home. That is definitely a good source for any patient. I' &m very blessed to have such good health care outside of the hospital.

name: Joan Garrett
text: I’ve been to other therapists, but the therapists at Therapy South are by far the best. They know their stuff, but they’re also friendly and fun to be around.  You’ll definitely feel better after working with them.

name: Kelly O'Neil
text: I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea. Bo and his team were very professional and helpful to my knee problem. Everyone I worked with was so nice and personable, at the same time, was very knowledgeable and helpful. If I should ever need any type of physical therapy in the future I will definitely be returning to TherapySouth Chelsea. Thank you so much for the excellent care I received, and for restoring my strength in my knee to fully recover from my previous surgery!

name: David Patterson
text: Following my left knee replacement surgery on December 22, 2020, I chose Therapy South in Chelsea for my physical therapy.  I based my decision on the convenience to my home.  I was very pleased with the professional care I received from my therapist Bo Dawson.  I steadily progressed with  his hands on skills and goals he set for me.   He communicated with me and made sure I understood what outcome I could achieve.  I plan to use Bo or one of the other therapist when I I follow thru on my right knee replacement surgery.

name: Tony Wheeler
text: I highly recommend this clinic!  They are such a great group of people. Bo Dawson was my therapist for the last year but I have worked closely with all of them. As a team, they helped me recover through the most traumatic experience of my life. Bo, Nathan, JB, Robbie, and everyone else... thank you all, for everything!

name: Janet O
text: Although needing physical therapy is not a pleasant situation, the staff here are wonderful and I can’t say one negative thing about my experience with them. JB was my main therapist and he was always pleasant, professional, and encouraging. All the staff are so helpful and I am glad I chose Therapy South Chelsea. If I ever need PT again, I will definitely go back to them.

name: Michael Seymour
text: TherapySouth Chelsea has an amazing staff! They are all very friendly, knowledgable, and hardworking! You can tell they truly care about their clients and want them to get better, not just linger in perpetual therapy. They make you feel like a part of the family, not a patient or customer.

name: Paula Davis
text: Friendly, knowledgeable staff. They were a pleasure to work with and my son recovered quickly. Would definitely use again!!

name: Greg Jordan
text: These guys are great. Caring, professional and very helpful. This is the third time I have used their services. I highly recommend.

name: Dave Urech
text: Very clean.  Knowledgeable and caring staff that makes it a bit fun!

name: Matt Mason
text: The staff are knowledgeable and extremely personable. They ask good questions, explain how the body is working or why it's not working so well, and how to get you moving in the right direction. If you like, they'll print out exercises so you don't forget any home workouts that they encourage you to maintain. They're even on the ball administratively and do a great job helping you schedule your visits. I don't normally write online reviews but they really are the total package. I wrote this as a small thank you for the great experience I've had.

name: Alex ellison
text: I am beyond impressed with my experience at therapy south and with my PT Bo. I was sent there with some strange symptoms post c-section. It turns out my issue was not physical therapy related but Bo called my physician to make sure I was seen immediately. He has since followed up twice to check on my progress. I really appreciate the extra care this team takes especially since I was only in need of an evaluation.

name: Tanya Adams
text: I highly recommend TherapySouth. They are a very caring staff!!! They do a great job!!! Thank you soo much for helping me!!!!

name: Monica Steelreath
text: I had a great experience at TherapySouth in Chelsea, AL. The Physical Therapists and Assistants were all professional and nice. I had a total knee replacement and I felt that the staff had an interest in my healing process. Hannah always greeted me with a smile. Nathan and Abby adjusted my needs for a speedy recovery. I would definitely recommend TherapySouth Chelsea for your Physical Therapy needs.

name: Seth Boman
text: Friendly staff! Highly recommend!

Special  thanks to   Mitchell  as he worked  more  closely with my  treatment.  I  would  definitely  recommend  this facility  for your  physical  therapy.

text: I am so appreciative and thankful for the support I received at Therapy South! I was always greeted by my name and with a smile from Hannah! If I ever need PT again, I will be sure to go back to Therapy South!

text: My experience with everyone at TherapySouth Chelsea was absolutely amazing. My physical therapist was Bo, and I really appreciate how knowledgeable and personable he was. I highly recommend TherapySouth Chelsea!

text: I had the greatest experience at the Chelsea, Al Therapy South location. Nathan and Bo are what  true customer service is like, these therapists not only got me going again they made my visits a dream. I strongly recommend these guys if anyone needs physical therapy. 👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽

text: Therapy South is clean and all the people I have come in contact with are very nice and professional. I have already recommended them to several of my friend’s.

text:
TherapySouth Chelsea and Robby Head are top of the line!  Robby is very professional.  He  helped me during my recovery from hip replacement surgery.  With his caring guidance and mastery of his profession (he has his Doctorate in Physical Therapy and over a decade of experience), I regained my strength, balance, and agility.

I have already recommended Robby to a friend who also had hip replacement surgery.  That friend agrees with my assessment of Robby.  She is very happy with his service.  She in turn recommended her husband who suffers with back issues to Robby.  All three of us are so happy to work with Robby.

Robby is a young man of high character, professionalism, and wisdom.

Pat Longworth Krauser

Came in with a walker and left walking on my own two feet. Many thanks and extremely grateful for all of their help and support, especially my PT Bo Dawson!!! They ROCK!

resp.text: Thank you Elisabeth! I'm glad you are doing so much better!

text: Thank you to all the staff at Therapy South, I am very pleased with my care. Thank you Bo for your exceptional knowledge of what needed to be done so I could avoid knee surgery. text: I highly recommend Therapy South in Chelsea. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and caring. When I arrived for each appointment, I was asked how my ankle felt, any issues I was having and then I was told what was going to be done that day for therapy. My therapist Bo Dawson was super to work with!

resp.text: Thank you Lena! We really enjoy getting to know each of our patients and creating a plan that will help our patients achieve their personalized goals!

text: I actually ate at Joseph's table and loved it

name: Pat and Emily Dubay
text:
My experience at Therapy South Chelsea was with Bo, Nathan and Mandy.  They were all great to work with and very professional and helped me out tremendously.  The facility is very nice and clean.
I really appreciate them getting me on the road to feeling better.

resp.text: Thank you Pat and Emily for your kind words! We love seeing our patients get back to doing the things they love!

name: C Kiser
text: Following full ankle reconstruction, a tendon graft and heel re-positioning, Therapy South and my primary therapist, Bo Dawson, did a fantastic job of helping me regain my range of motion, flexibility and function. I have used Robby Head's team at the Chelsea location on several occasions over the years and was satisfied each and every time. Highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! I'm glad you are doing so well!

name: Robbie Kirk
text: Caring and personable staff. Patient-centered treatment plan, not just a standardized generic approach. Therapists are constantly researching and learning new innovative methods, especially their occupational hand therapists. I had an unusually difficult tendon repair on my left hand. Three total surgeries due to severed tendon, subsequent rupture, then finally a bizarre autoimmune rejection of the deep tissue stitches. These folks never gave up! They researched ideas to help me improve my flexion and thanks to their efforts, I have finally regained my ability to play the guitar. I will forever be indebted!

name: Ann Limbach
text: When I first struggled to get out of the car for my first PT appointment and my therapist, Bo Dawson, came to help me get out of the car, I thought my total hip rehab was going to be a long difficult process.  Now, 8 weeks post surgery, I am walking normally without even a cane!  My treatment was individualized and personal with achievable challenges and goals injected with humor to relieve any stress.  I saw this happening with other patients as well and the smiles were infectious!  Recovery from surgery is not easy but the team at Therapy South Chelsea makes it a positive, achievable experience!!

resp.text: Thanks Ann! We love serving the people in the Chelsea area!

name: Ron Owen
text: I was very pleased with the attention and care received from the staff that worked with me (Bo, Nathan and Abby).  They all are very knowledgeable and helpful.  Bo's plan of action really helped and the home exercises are simple and should keep the progress that has been made!  I highly recommend TherapySouth CHELSEA.  This was actually my 2nd series of visits... The 2nd issue was a doctor referral in hopes to delay or avoid the need for a knee replacement.  When PT was suggested, I requested TherapySouth CHELSEA because of the care that I received before, not to mention the location for me is absolutely perfect!

name: Ronnie Nabors
text: TherapySouthChelsea made my recovery so easy it almost seems like it never happened. I destroyed my shoulder and had a lot of repair work on it. The professionals here are all caring, and great at their job, I had the pleasure of working with them all over the 3 months of rehab. I used to joke they had to draw straws to see who got stuck with me LOL. If knowing that someone cares about you as well as your healing, this is where you need to be. Thanks again to all my friends there, may you be well.

resp.text: Thank you Ronnie! I'm glad your experience was such a good one!

name: Robert Craig
text: Everyone at Therapy South in Chelsea has been wonderful!  My primary Therapist has been great!  She makes sure I accomplish all the stretches and pulls I need get these muscles back in shape.  Amanda Spalding has lots of experience and will work you over as you improve. Great group!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Robert!

resp.text: Thank you Paula! Glad you are doing so well!

name: Jenny Riddle
text: The entire staff is friendly, professional, and truly cares about helping you get better. The atmosphere is cheerful, and I'm always in a better mood when I leave. I have full confidence in all of the therapists abilities, and they've treated my shoulder well. I'm also now a big fan of dry needling, when it can help! They are like physical magicians :)

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words Jenny! We love our patients and love seeing them achieve their goals!

name: Matt Jons
text: The crew at Therapy South Chelsea is fantastic. I would recommend anyone needing PT that lives in the Chelsea area, to go here if you want the very best recovery and overall experience. I had a serious injury & surgery and am very active in life sports. The staff knew they had to get me back in peak shape so I would be able to compete and enjoy sports again. I want to give a special thanks to Erick for helping me get thru this process. It was not easy, but he knew what I needed and encouraged me to be patient and assured me that I would achieve a total recovery. Also, the receptionist, Hannah,  is very efficient & pleasant to work with. A business is only as good as their people and their ability to work as a team. This place is A+ in the people & teamwork department.

resp.text: Thank you Matt! We strive to give patients the best quality of life by providing exceptional care while they are with us!

name: Joanne Williamson
text: The team was very professional and knowledgeable. I would recommend them to anyone needing therapy.

name: Donald Slee, Jr
text:
I have chosen Therapy South Chelsea for the second time in two years to provide me with therapy services to assist me with recovery from my second total knee replacement.  My first experience (in February 2016) led me straight back to the team at Therapy South Chelsea in February 2018 for therapy to assist in recovery from my final total knee replacement.
I was very impressed with the level of expertise, quality of service and the professionalism of the Director (Robby Head), Therapists (Abby and Erick) and the Office Administrator, Hannah, who assisted me with "juggling" sometimes last minute appointments due to a difficult work schedule.
Following my surgery, I was quickly put into a program which aided in restoring full mobility and avoided what I have heard is typical "stiffness" due to the formation of scar tissue.
I can recommend, without any hesitation or reservation whatsoever, Therapy South Chelsea as the premier provider of Physical Therapy in our area.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Don! We are thankful to have been able to get you going after both of your surgeries.

name: Kris Findlay
text: Very helpful!

name: Billy Studdard
text: The entire staff of Therapy South is both professional and friendly. While the mechanics of rehab may not always be pleasurable the environment in which you rehab can be, Therapy South in Chelsea is a pleasurable place in which to rehab because of the quality of the people who work there. They are professional yet a joy to be around. I would recommend them and will use them again in the future as the need arises.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Mr. Studdard! We enjoy working with you!

name: Ryan Jones
text: Definitely had a great experience at this Therapy South location. Robbie was wonderful to work with, as well as all of the other staff that I was fortunate enough to work with. If you need physical therapy in the area, this is THE place to go!

resp.text: Thank you Ryan!

name: Elizabeth Cooley
text: TherapySouth Chelsea is where I would recommend anyone, post-surgery or with chronic pain, to go for physical therapy. The therapist are phenomenal in all areas of their field. They listen and work with you according to what is going on with your body. I've done my physical therapy after ACL replacement surgery and my knee is stronger than it has ever been. I'm currently doing therapy on lower back issues and I'm getting better each day. I've even got my mom going for pain management. This is the place to go for physical therapy. I think of the physical therapist and Hannah, Kelly and Andrew as if they were my family, that is just how much they care. I feel so blessed that they are located in Chelsea, AL.

resp.text: Thank you Elizabeth! You were a pleasure to work with and we are happy to have helped you achieve your goals!

name: Clark Kelley
text: Every one was great and professional

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Ashley Arrowood
text:
My journey with physical therapy began during the most painful time in my life to date.  I never imagined the experience would become so personal.  At my first visit, I met with Robby to discuss all my issues.  He has a genuine nature, a respect for where you are in the process, and a drive to see you return to wellness.  He took the time to evaluate me and was methodical in his design of a plan that worked not only in the clinic but could be transitioned to home. He championed me through tough times with kindness, professionalism, and a warmth that led to a trust which is necessary for the recovery process to be successful.  He is a credit to his profession and an asset to TherapySouth.
Throughout the following weeks, I worked with Abbey.  Abbey is truly a pioneer in her field.  She is focused and attentive during every session, kind, compassionate, knowledgeable, and helpful.  When I was doubtful, she was always there to encourage me, being honest with me about the challenges I would face, yet reassuring me that I would one day be able to return to a life filled with many athletic endeavors.  Abbey is understanding and genuinely takes a personal interest in how you're feeling.  She always made sure to explain every exercise in depth and also how it would aid in my progress going forward.  I feel lucky to have been guided by Abbey along my PT journey, for it was her encouragement that pushed me through when I was at my lowest.
Hannah is also extremely helpful and efficient.  Being the face you see when you first walk in, she is cheerful and always greets the patients by name.  TherapySouth has an amazing team and, more importantly, great teamwork.  It is modern and very nice, clean, and an extremely well-run practice.  I couldn't be happier with my experience with something I wasn't at all looking forward to.
Thank you to the TherapySouth team for always answering my questions with interest and patience.  You guys have truly made my recovery a more pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Ashley! I am thankful you are doing so well!

name: charles lewis
text: Love you guys!!

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Lewis! Glad you are doing well!

name: Tina Reed
text: Went with my sister for her inner ear therapy. Very nice people & clean place. Small but effective.

text: Fyzical is without a doubt the best place to go for your physical therapy needs! They are amazing at what they do. Every session is one-on-one and specialized to your needs. I can honestly say that I look forward to my physical therapy visits each week!!

text: This is an amazing place that few people know about! I am going because of an onset of vertigo and this is the place to relearn balance and deal with issues of vertigo. If you have a loved one with balance issues this is the place to be.

I actually enjoy my therapy and look forward to it. The therapists I have used are Shawna, Jeff and others. They are consistent in their treatment and always ready to do anything to make sure I’m comfortable. I recommend Fyzical to anyone who needs any type of therapy. They are in the process of helping me wit my balance and are doing a great job!   Peggy Hughes

name: Ligia Maximilian
text: Very kind and caring staff. They wouldn't give up on me until they found the problem. I had to stop going because I had a family emergency, and I got two courtesy calls: one from the receptionist and one from my physical therapist. They were very warm and compassionate and showed genuine concern for me. I will continue my treatments there as soon as I am able to and I will most definitely recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We always try to help others get back to living without pain; so they can do the things they love!

The team is awesome!  I cannot express enough how great they are, they took me in when I was at my lowest & walked me through my recovery.

Thank you guys for being there for me!:)
Bev

text: Amazing service! Everyone is very nice. I recently had surgery for a torn labrum ( shoulder dislocations). Within 6 weeks I was able to rotate freely and lift 10 pound weights! If I ever need PT again, this is my go to place no doubt!

text:
After seeing 5 specialists concerning hip and back pain for the past year Dr Matt Elliot  diagnosed  my problem. With Pt exercises and dry needle therapy  I am pain free.
The staff is very  patience  and friendly and  goes out of their way to help  their patients  be pain free.
I highly recommend Results  Physiotherapy!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review! We are thrilled that you had a positive experience at our clinic. Please don’t hesitate to come back if other issues arise.

name: Tamika Alexander
text: Drayer Trussville staff is phenomenal. They are very thorough with completing your treatment plan and really care about your progress. I have an amazing experience every time I’m referred to them for PT. Please give Bill and the staff a try for all your PT needs.

resp.text: Tamika - thank you for your kind words.  Bill and the team are so grateful for your recommendation!
