text:
I have had the pleasure of having the best caring and knowledgeable group of physical therapists in Central Birmingham. Trust me I have had others. Here you can tell this group loves what they do.
Love you all.
Smooches loves what they .
0l

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Marquita Ridgeway
text: I have been coming to Drayer Physical Therapy for about 6 weeks now for knee surgery that I had on July 2.... The physical therapists and staff are awesome... They are genuinely invested in your recovery... They push me so that my recovery is 100%.... They take their time with your care and just an awesome group to work with.... I am very pleased with the progress of my recovery after the extensive surgery that I had.....  I would recommend Drayer Physical Therapy/Trussville to anyone who needs physical therapy.... They are the best!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!

name: Cassandra Moore
text:
I have been going  and still going to Drayer Physical Therapy had total knee revision and upper tendon quadrant repair . All the therapist there are great they care about you and really help you a lot to get you back to where you can function and help with your pain. All the P.T. Techs are great they help you with the exercise and also set you up on the hot packs and  ice machines and everybody there makes therapy more enjoyable.
I would recommend this place to anybody.

Cassie Moire

resp.text: Thank you Cassandra!

name: Cindy Wilson
text: I have used Drayer 4 times and have always had a great experience. I just finished my 3 time with my knees and in that 6 weeks everyone of the therapist worked on me. All of them were caring and encouraging. I feel like they treat me like a friend. I would recommend this place to anyone

name: Rebecca Byard
text: I thoroughly enjoyed my time here! The staff were all incredibly kind and legitimately invested in my recovery. They worked very well together to provide excellent care, and a fun, friendly, encouraging,  environment. I’m kind of sad to be done with my routine visits, but they did provide a great app with home exercises and continued support to continue strengthening and prevent reinjury. I highly recommend Drayer, and specifically the Trussville office!

resp.text: Thank you Rebecca.

name: Joe Knight
text: Had a great experience at Drayer in Trussville after shoulder surgery. All the therapists, technicians and staff were pleasant and kind. They seemed to work well with each other in order to give the patients the best care possible. No one aspires to be in rehab, however if you are, this team is awesome.

name: Robin Foshee
text: I had a great experience at Drayer in Trussville.  The recovery from my ankle surgery has been excellent due to the knowledge and thoroughness of my therapists.  Every therapist there was excellent and always kind and compassionate.  I recommend this facility to everyone I know.

name: Michael Darden
text: Cudos to Drayer. Thank you for making a rehabilitation of my shoulder an actual enjoyable experience. Everyone is super nice, but at same time very professional. Would not let me stray from program.feel like I have made new friends with Natalie, Sarah and all others that worked on me.

name: Alex Avram
text: I did PT with Natalie Shannon at Drayer Trussville twice. I had knee surgery and about 6 months later had shoulder surgery. All of the staff are super friendly and more than accommodating. They treated me like family. I was worked on by several of the PT's there and they all knew my situation and my surgery so it was a breeze any time because everyone knew everything about every body! Great atmosphere. Definitely recommend Natalie and her team!

name: Campbell Holley
text: Great staff had multiple surgery’s and each time return to smiling faces looking to get me back and heathier than ever.

name: yvonne james
text: This is a wonderful helpful place the people are all really nice there playful and we can have a lot of fun while at the same time we are working hard to recover our mobility and or strength. I have been coming here for a very long time and would never go anywhere else and tell all my family and friends about this place.

name: Quiet Observe
text:
Pt. Tech Sarah Gill was rude and disrespectful to me as the mother of my daughter.
The Physical Therapist was very argumentative to me as I was speaking to the receptionist.
I . and Sarah gill jumped in risky interrupting the conversation to say oh well we can further your appointments out.
I advise her that I have exhausted
all my benefits.So, I only have 2 more visits.
As, I was at the physical therapy she did not let me know what was going on with daughter treatment.
However, made sure to not state anything to me about her condition she continue to treat me with no respect.I do not recommend this place of business to anyone.
We will not be returning anymore.

name: Stephen Foster
text: Nice staff and great team work

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Patricia Webb
text: caring and professional physical and occupational therapy center.

name: Ed Bartlett
text: If you need physical therapy, I highly recommend Champion, Hueytown.  Stephanie and Josh both are excellent.  They seem to see the larger picture and strive to get you there.

resp.text: Thank you for your great review. We love to read about our team's compassionate and quality care. They will really appreciate your fantastic feedback! We're always here to get you on the right track to healing!

name: Christy Frankin
text: Let's face it, if you're having to go to therapy you've already had something bad happen and you don't feel good. At Champion Sports Medicine it was nice to see friendly smiling faces. They keep an upbeat attitude and work with you at your on pace, as to help you have a better recovery. I recommend them to anyone having to go thru the healing process.

resp.text: We are happy to hear about your positive experience while in the care of our excellent therapy team. We'll make sure they are recognized for their great work in your healing process. Thank you for your review.

name: 2Badcats
text: This is my third experience with Champion & all have been outstanding. Highly recommend Josh & the staff.

resp.text: You needed care. We are grateful to be here for you. Thank you for entrusting your care to us to feel better and get back to life.

name: Gerald Waldrop
text:
Joshua is very knowledgeable, caring & very helpful. He is considerate of me & makes sure I don't have pain with my rehab.

To me, he's the best by far!

resp.text: We're happy to hear you're on the road to recovery. During this uncertain time, we want to make sure we're going the extra mile in supporting our patients and providing essential health services. Thank you for the review and for trusting us with your care.

name: Todd Hicks
text: Friendly, helpful. They care about you both as a person and about getting you healthy physically

resp.text: You needed care. We are grateful to be here for you. Thank you for entrusting your care to us to feel better and get back to life.

name: Candice Lee
text: Josh Dabbs and Champion Sports Medicine in Hueytown are wonderful.  We could not ask for better care.  Josh is very knowledgeable and absolutely wonderful with my son.  I would recommend Josh and the other therapists at Champion in Hueytown to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for your great feedback. Our goal is to use our clinical knowledge and expertise to guide you on your path to recovery. We're glad to hear that you're satisfied with our service and appreciate you entrusting us with your care.

name: Lottie Jewell
text: My hip is getting better as it was very sore when I started therapy and I could hardly walk.

resp.text: You needed care. We are grateful to be here for you. Thank you for entrusting your care to us to feel better and get back to life.

name: Yolanda Williams
text: At Champion Sports Medicine, everyone is so professional and courteous.  The workouts are designed for your specific needs and there is a home exercise program you can access to guide you with easy to follow instructions, track your activity and progress throughout treatment, and to gain a deeper understanding of your condition to the road to a healthy recovery.

name: Janet Craft
text: I have being doing my Physical Therapy at Champion for the last several weeks. Everyone there has been extremely friendly and helpful. They work with me to push my limits, but take the time to learn my limitations. They've work hard to get me back to where I was before the surgery.

name: Kenneth Eddings
text: The staff at Champion Sports Medicine  we’re very professional, friendly  and polite. They work hard with me and every patient to get them back healthy. I would highly recommend them for anyone needing physical therapy.

name: C Wil
text: The staff is very friendly and every minute is dedicated to your recovery. I recommend this place to anyone that is serious about returning to full strength.

name: Alan Campbell
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly. Great people and service. Highly recommend.

name: Marketa mallard
text: Champion sports is the best place to be amazing staff . Well professional they have gotten me feeling much better I will recommend any who need physical therapy to go to champion sports 😊

name: Dan Thigpen
text: Tyler was very knowledgeable when it came to treating my injury.  I would recommend Chapion Sports Medicine for any injury that requires rehab

name: Gloria Pittman
text: Wonderful staff and service. Friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Natalie Bailey
text: Staff was personable.

name: DAPHNE JONES
text: The Staff is PHENOMENAL!! Very caring, patient, cautious, respectful, courteous and professional! They are knowledgeable, extremely skilled and watchful on how to approach the next level of therapy needed. They have been sensitive to my needs and know how to push (Not Demand) to the next level with personal attention to detail! Exceptional attitudes always working as a TEAM! That includes the front desk…always professional and greet me with kindness and respect when I walk through the door…Great Team! 👍🏾

name: Lloyd Brown
text: Professional, caring and supportive staff.  They are absolutely invested in my recovery from surgery.  I look forward to every visit because each one is one step closer to a full recovery!

name: Laura Susie Mezzanotte
text: I’m really appreciated this therapists for helping with my back problems before and after injection back and past with ankle surgery with therapy. I been attend to therapy south in Pell City Alabama about 4 or so years that’s excellent therapist and more equipments  as bikes and exercising ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ with 5 stars ❤️

name: Christopher Bunt
text: The therapist Tyler and his entire staff are wonderful. They will help you physically while keeping the mood very lite and enjoyable.

name: Brian Simmons
text: Professional, caring, qualified and supportive. Everything you could ever want in a therapy group. TherapySouth will continue to be the only place I go!

name: Sherry Kendrick
text: I first came for therapy in 2018 per MD recommendation and found the facility clean, well equipped and conveniently located. From office administration to each therapist and asst everyone was kind, encouraging and helpful in assuring that I understood my therapy and that I did each activity correctly. Eventually insurance stopped paying but by then I was already much better. They had also emailed instructions for a plan for me to follow at home. I will not lie and say that I did my homework as directed but I did do it at times. Now I am back again with same knee issue, I assume much of it is lack of follow through on my part. I do plan to become diligent in doing my homework even when I no longer am coming. But let me say there is nothing changed on this 2nd go-around. The facility remains very clean and comfortable and all the staff are wonderful. I would highly recommend this facility

name: Donya
text: They are very good at what they do and they are all very friendly! I have used them twice so far for differenct reasons. I would use them again!!

name: Beth Dugas
text: I went to Therapy South for roughly 3 months and saw Tyler H.  I had severe back pain and I was doubtful that he was going to be able to help me.  Well was I ever wrong.  He did his magic and my back is much better.  He gave me a list of exercises to do at home so I don't have to see him unless I need  to.  I highly recommend Therapy South and Tyler.

name: Floyd Brooks
text: Have been going now for 12 weeks. Really great staff! Friendly, courteous, and always working to get the most out of your time spent there. Highly recommend Therapy South, Pell City.

name: Cindy Dailey
text:
Pell City
Exceptional service. Professional yet friendly. Clean and comfortable setting. PTs care and work with each other to plan and implement the best treatment for patients. Flexible hours too.  I highly recommend Therapy South.

name: Rosalie LaSalle
text: I highly recommend Therapy South.  The staff is very friendly and professional.  I will definitely use them again if I need any PT in the future.

name: Kevin Chappell
text: Great place to do your therapy. Highly recommend

name: paula handley
text: Everyone there is great and are always so kind even when you are having a hard time they go out of there way to be sure you they take care of you

name: Wesly Denton
text: Great staff, polite and professional.

name: Caroline McGee
text: Karen is superb at what she does! She takes time to listen each visit and always puts me through my paces. She was quick to recommend another therapy to augment her therapy. She looks at the long-term benefits and was very conscious of my number of visits on insurance. Overall, I am very pleased with the therapy I received and will keep coming as I have a long-term disability.

name: Jason Powell
text: Therapy Achievements was alright.  Went there and everything went alright but felt that they were just kind of phoning it in with the therapy.  Apparently they were just charging my insurance for the money.  Last visit there according to the invoice I received today was from almost 11 months ago.  Didn't hear anything from them for over 11 months till I got a bill today for almost 600 bucks.  Glad I chose to go to another PT because they didn't do me this way plus they were a lot more active in making sure I got better.

resp.text: Mr. Powell, we are so sorry that you didn't have a better experience.  We have tried to reach out to you a few times over the phone with the number you provided to us during your visits. Feel free to call us at 256-509-4398. Dianne would be happy to speak with you on this matter.

name: Lon Moncrief
text:
We came here from inpatient rehab where the therapist had a number of patients at one time. The one on one attention is great.  My wife has make great progress in her recovery.  The therapist have the necessary experience to get the most out of each session and the patient.

I would recommend Therapy Achievements to anyone seeking maximum recovery from their illness or surgery.

resp.text: We appreciate your review Mr. Moncrief! Your wife is a joy to work with and we look forward to seeing her continued progress!

name: Rosalind Rainey
text: Such a nice and profesional group that actually cares  and takes the time to explain and answer questions.  I feel hopeful now knowing what my issues are that no one ever explained to me in the past.  More doctors should use this service and refer their patients.  I look forward to being able to  move  around more without the severe leg pain.

resp.text: Ms. Rainey, we are so happy that your experience here has been positive. We are also thankful that you are finally getting some of the answers to the questions you had. We look forward to working with you more! Thank you for the review!

name: Elizabeth Harrell
text: My son twisted his knee in one of his basketball games, so he went to Therapy Achievements for Therapy . I love everyone there, they are so helpful and nice to everyone. I love the fact that the patients are getting one on one therapy with each therapist. It is not like the other places when you are in a big room with all the other patients and therapist. This clinic is on a more of a personal level and I love that. I also love the fact that the therapist answer all of your questions in a way that you can understand. I think the best part about Therapy Achievements is the fact that they offer all different kinds of programs and services, its like a one stop shop!!!!!!!

name: Kenneth Lane
text: I have just  had one treatment and my lower legs looks better than before. I look forward to my continue therapy with them. The staff that work with me , gave excellent service and advice.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Mr. Kenneth! We are so glad to hear that you are already able to notice a difference in your lower legs. We look forward to working with you more.

name: Leslie Griffin
text: Wonderful, knowledgeable staff.  We have been very pleased with results of lymphedema therapy (personally) and have had extensive, professional experience with dozens of our customers who have gone through the driver training process for specialized driver controls to keep them active  & on-the-go!

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your review, Ms. Griffin. We are so happy that we were able to help with your lymphedema, and that there have been so many positive experiences related to our driving evaluations. We are always eager to help!

name: david pepper

resp.text: Thanks Hannah!  We are so glad we get to work with you and look forward to all the great things you will achieve.

text: Slow servers  .spend over 45 min waiting for help putting someone in bed .turns off call light then leaves

name: Samantha Yoho
text: The gym was a little crowded, but I was still able to workout and make room and the equipment was in great shape, the cleanliness is what caught my attention. As someone that works in gyms and travels, the cleanliness was everything. Great job! Not to mention the guest pass prices are amazing!!!! I had a very good experience and I was able to get a great workout while I was in town. I will be back for sure, every time I come to Atmore. Thank you!

name: Carla Williams
text: The staff there are very kind. They prepare you for each exercise they assure you with instructions. I'm going for my back and I am made aware how to get better.

name: Brendapam Harris
text: Very nice people.  They make sure that you are comfortable for the job to get done. They all deserve a 2 week paid vacation. (Especially HEAVEN because she came all the way from Jackson,alabama to help. 3 weeks for HEAVEN. Love you guys.😁

name: Bridgette
text: Absolutely the most attentive staff I have ever worked with throughout the last 20 years of my physical therapy journey.  Their building is always, extremely clean and tidy and they do everything they can to make the environment a safe one, especially during these trying times we are faced with today.  The therapists are absolutely amazing and I just adore speaking to and seeing Mrs. Jennifer and her smiling face!  I would highly recommend them for your PT needs!

name: Joyce Lambert
text: Good location, picked HealthActions because of former "Y" trainer.

name: Jaime Hawkins
text: Thay are the  best,  kindest gruup.

name: alice buie
text: Get good experience

name: Dominique Hudson
text: wow I love this place and i’ve just been here once!!! erin was amazing at her job, and the scheduling lady, alissa was so sweet. I was so nervous when I first came but Erin made me feel right at home.

resp.text: Hello, Dominique. That's great to hear! We're so glad to know that Erin and Alissa put you at ease and made you feel comfortable.  Thank you for taking the time to let others know about your experience at Huntsville Hospital Therapy and Sports Rehab.

name: Mark Toland
text: Had a hip replacement and the therapists are very nice. Understanding and compassionate but fair. They make sure you do what is needed to get better for your own good. But are also aware everyone has a different opinion of what pain is. Some people break a toe and fall apart. Others myself included can break bones and not go to the ER for 2 or 3 days. If you follow directions and dedicate yourself to doing what needs to be done they are awesome! Every person I have interacted with has treated me as a person with respect and understanding-that alone is worth more than you realize. Thank you to everyone there for their support and hard work.

resp.text: Hi, Mr. Toland! We love hearing from our patients and appreciate you taking  the time to share your experiences. We're glad to know that our staff made such a positive difference in your recovery. We'll make sure our entire team sees your nice message.

name: Carolyn Howell
text: Cardiac rehabilitation was very helpful in my recovery!

resp.text: That is wonderful to hear, Ms. Howell!

name: Gail Johnson
text: My therapist is Kelly Daniels. She knows her stuff. I was walking into walls and staggering like a drunk. Her attitude and personality is wonderful, but the most important thing, is she's an expert in vertigo.

name: April Simmons
text: My therapist, Shasta, is very knowledgeable and a very hard worker toward reaching the goal we set. She has me working from the time I get there to the time I leave, she is concerned about my progress.

name: Ernest Price
text: My experience was worth choosing this location, as I walked in at day 1, I was well greeted, the entire staff made me feel welcome. The pain and discomfort that   I was experiencing the PTs went above and beyond with care to help me feel better ( thanks) .Speaking on the entire staff each one would call you by your name, which made a person felt special,at the time of leaving the ladies at the front desk acknowledged you with a smile making sure that your following appointments were scheduled and a goodbye.

name: Tisha Hurst
text: Health Actions physical therapists and therapy assistances work to find root cause issues and have many many therapies and exercises that they use to help correct your physical issue.

name: Natasha Yates
text: Best place for therapy with therapist who care about you and your health and mobility! Thank you Suzie you are the best!

name: Kathy Jackson
text: This therapy was Great.The Therapists were all extremely friendly and very knowledgeable about their thearpy.If you had any questions about what they were doing they were glad to answer.I am so glad I chose them for my help.I would highly recommend them for your problems.

name: Luke Thurman
text: Great place all the staff are friendly and helpful they did a great job with my knee

name: Nicki Bryan
text:
Darbi Jackson is amazing!  She sets the bar for going above and beyond!    She has been a huge blessing in helping care for our Daughter who has a connective tissue disorder (chronic dislocations and severe muscle spasms).  She is always willing to listen and understand before trying to resolve issues.  She has helped us avoid ER visits due to spasms and dislocations.  She has partnered with our specialist(s) to provide world class PT care!  We don’t know what we would do without Darbi!

Kristina at the front desk has been exceedingly helpful with insurance and scheduling and always presents a smile!

name: Burgandy
text: I cannot recommend this place enough. I started going here when my son was about a year and a half. My husband worked long hours and I had no choice but to bring him with me for every appointment. They were incredible from the very beginning and so so loving to my little one, even playing with him if he got too stir crazy. I went for a while before and having surgery and went back after. We had been going about a year when we moved and this team had really become like family. I absolutely adore all these friendly men and women and would have never accomplished what I needed to without them. They made me comfortable to bring my son and because of this it became possible to get the help I needed.

resp.text: Thank you for taking a minute to write a review. It was our pleasure to  have you guys in the clinic! It was not a problem and he always kept our therapists smiling! If we can ever help you guys in the future please don’t hesitate to reach out!!

name: Alexis Orate

text: I've been going to physical therapy here since September 18, 2019 and I can honestly say that it has really helped. I don't have quite as much pain and I'm not as stiff as I was before .  All the staff are friendly and helpful. I'm really going to miss everyone 😢.

name: Darrel Winchell
text: The staff are excellent, however I was discharged from their care on July 31 which was a Monday, 3 days later was billed for services not rendered on August 3. I called & spoke with management who said they had my printed signature along with check in time of 3:27 which is a complete falsehood as I vividly recall telling Hailey I would not be back Thursday as I was discharged from under their care. I have an excellent recall for certain details in my day to day life no memory problems here ! In my opinion just another case of greed. In the medical field. Shame on these type of swindlers .

name: Sabrina C
text: Loved everyone I came in contact with here! After experiencing an immobilizing soccer injury and expecting to dread physical therapy, these dedicated therapists changed my view on it entirely. They made going to  therapy not a burden, but rather an enjoyable and HELPFUL experience.

name: Melissa Griggs
text: The staff is very friendly and care about your pain and make changes as needed to help. I would recommend this place to anyone who needs physical therapy.

resp.text:
Mrs. Griggs,
Thank you for taking the time to reply. We appreciate you choosing Enterprise Therapy Center!

name: Charles Brown
text:
Being retired military I’ve had an opportunity to experience many different physical therapy facilities. Throughout my time I have found that enterprise therapy Center is by far one of the best. This is a great family oriented facility. From the time you walk in you are greeted with a smile and treated as if you are part of the family.

I requested the tri-care referred me to enterprise therapy Center after having surgery on my elbow/tricep tendon. I was not sure if I was going to gain full range of motion. My physical therapist assistant’s name was Sam. She was phenomenal at keeping me encouraged and pushing me to trust the therapy plan.

Enterprise therapy center was such a phenomenal place to receive therapy that I called tri-care and told them to refer my son to this location for his ankle.
So, I not only trust him with my personal therapy, but I also trust them with the therapy of my entire family if needed. Enterprise therapy center is the only therapy center for the Brown family.

PS , thank you Enterprise Therapy Center for all that you did for my family and I.

C.L.E.M.S.O.N
GO TIGERS

resp.text:
Mr. Brown,
Thank you for taking time to write us a review. We really appreciate you as patient and for choosing to come to ETC for your outpatient physical therapy. It really has been a pleasure to have you here and to watch your hard work and progress along the way from the time that  you were initially evaluated! Thank you also for trusting us with your son and and his physical therapy treatment as well! You can be assured that he will be well cared for and will be a part of our ETC family as well! Wishing you guys the very best and thank you again!!

name: Mayra Wells
text: Wonderful staff! Their patience and knowledge of what I was going through after a very painful shoulder surgery help me a great deal. Thank you.!

name: Bobbi Bennett
text:
Just left... this was my 3rd time there, TOD (maybe 2 D’s).. was my therapist, asked my pain level and I told him 8, (been working all day), he set me up for an exercise and left, when I am done, I can see him at the computer in the office, so I sit down on a chair, he comes back out gives me an exercise and left, when I am done, he’s back in the office and on the computer... so I sit down in the chair again....
Waste of time and money !!!!!!
I obviously was bothering him and what he had to do on the computer in his office was way more important.
Didn’t even finish the rest of my appointment, just left after about 15 minutes of therapy.
Could use a refresher class on his people skills.
Didn’t make another appointment, I let the lady know at the front office that I was gonna try to go somewhere else.
EVERYONE ELSE HAS BEEN GREAT AND PROFESSIONAL....

resp.text:
Mr or Mrs Bennett,
Could you kindly remove this review? You have rated the wrong physical therapy clinic by mistake. We do not have any employee by that name.
Thank you.
Enterprise Therapy Center

name: Cole Feigl
text: I rarely take the time to write reviews, but with how amazing this place is I just had to. Enterprise Therapy Center has helped not only me, but two of my closest friends for years on end. After they both suffered multiple ACL/MCL tears, lower back pain, and tight hamstrings, ETC helped them through it every single time. These are Division 1 athletes each weighing 250 lbs or more. Not only did they help them significantly more than their professional trainers did, they were back on the field in record time. If they can help these guys, they can help any person out there. Best in the business!

text: My experience at the Orthopaedic Clinic has been top notch from my surgeon Dr. Dooley to Patrick, Jason, and Elizabeth who are highly trained, courteous, and professional Physical Therapists. I highly recommend the Orthopaedic Clinic .

text: The staff are friendly, efficient, and helpful. They keep me motivated, challenged and busy during the appointments. I have experienced remarkable weekly progress with their care and by following the homework pages provided.

name: Alexandra Hodges
text: Back in May I fell and broke the hook of hamate bone in my hand and also had an elbow fracture. We were new to Alabama and I did not know anything about anybody, but it was recommended to go here. I saw Dr. Hancy and he was awesome. He went above and beyond to help me, listened to me when I spoke and took me serious. He was very diligent in pursuing different methods of treatment, to try and bring me comfort and avoid surgery. Unfortunately, it appears that it’s still broken in my hand so I may end up with surgery after all. However it doesn’t bother me because I know I’m in very capable hands with Dr. Hancy. Also every time I had to get a cast put on or take it off the technicians were amazing. Overall for your orthopedic needs this is the place to go.

text: Such very helpful and nice folks!  Wonderful service and Elizabeth is super great at spending time and attention with her patients,.  All of the therapists are so nice and go out of their way to make sure you are comfortable while doing your therapy,  I do highly recommend this service and The Orthopedic Clinic and most especially Dr. Ryan Palmer!

name: Cindy Spann
text: We have used the Orthopedic Clinic's PT department in the past and I knew when my daughter needed hip surgery and required PT, we would be using them again. They are incredibly professional and very friendly. Her PT, Jason, works so well with her explaining all of the whys behind each activity the do so she completely understands the significance. It is apparent he cares about all his patients. We love using them, and if PT in needed in the future - we will be back again!

name: Matt Burke

Whenever I've had questions, my therapist has time to answer it without giving me the idea he/she is in a hurry. I look forward to my sessions because I know I will be in a happy atmosphere working with people who have a positive attitude and an encouraging point of view.

text: I have been to 4 other physical therapy clinics in my life. This one is the best , They have always been courteous , the whole staff, and they have put alot of effort getting me back going. I would highly recommend them !

text: They somehow "lost" my daughters appointment. Then my 9 year old sat in the lobby for over an hour in pain because of their negligence and they couldn't have cared less.

name: Jewel Buchanan
text: Jason Shropshire & the entire physical therapy team of the Orthopaedic Clinic of Opelika -- including Phillip, Kasey, Patrick, Michelle & a host of other competent professionals! You guided, challenged & inspired me after Dr. Shiels performed my bilateral knee replacement surgery. At each encounter, you clearly listened to me; assessed, gently pushed & respected me & gave clear instructions for maintaining success once I went home. In 12 sessions, my physical prowess changed FROM barely walking while requiring assistance in most basic activities of my daily life TO regained abilities & confidence in standing, sitting, walking my dogs in the woods, rolling over in bed, going up & down stairs, & even safely driving! THANK YOU for meeting me face-to-face on each personal goal & sending me back into the world with confidence!

The therapists are obviously well trained in physical therapy or they wouldn’t be practicing but they are COMPASSIONATE and NICE and I look forward to my spent in their care.

name: Zach Smith
text: The worst service, We were billed incorrectly for future office visits that they knew we did not need. A simple office visit turned into a huge bill. They would not work with us, and simple got mad when we questioned the charges. I will drive three hours to see another doctor than to spend another dime at this doctor's office.

name: Jerry Sartain
text: Great individual care for rehab!

name: Julie Druhan
text: My therapist, Patrick, always took the time to listen to me and to provide information to help me make decisions about my care. He was always pleasant, professional and encouraging.

name: claudia stanley
text:
We were initially very impressed with the staff here.  Very friendly and concerned.  Our appointment with Dr. Wilson was one month ago.  He stated that he could not help my husband's issue and suggested that he see a local neurologist.  We appreciated his honesty.  Since our regular Parkinson's neurologist is in Atlanta, Dr. Wilson said that he would refer us to a neurologist and forward the records.  As of today's date, we haven't heard a word from anyone.....we would assume that if there was an issue with a new appointment, we would have been contacted by Dr. Wilson's office.  I am sure that The Orthopedic Clinic and Dr. Wilson are very good at what they do, but we would have appreciated at least having a follow up of some sort.  Was the referral ever made?  We have no idea since we don't know the name of the neurologist he was referring my husband to, so cannot call that office for confirmation.  I don't feel I should have to call Dr. Wilson's staff to make sure the referral was even made.  We will be seeking help ourselves elsewhere.

UPDATE AS OF OCTOBER 3, 2018  We finally received a letter from a neurologist in Auburn giving us an appointment date.  No phone calls, nothing.  Just a letter telling when to be there.  And by the way, the appointment is scheduled 11 MONTHS after our appointment with Dr. Wilson.  Seriously?  January of 2019.  That is just unacceptable.

name: Thomas V. O'Connor, III
text: Patrick and Jason do an outstanding job

name: morgan wallace
text: I am currently on Medicaid and live in Montgomery. After talking to medicaid and calling all the orthopedic doctor on their list in my area and getting rejected because of the insurance type I was at my wit's end and in extreme pain. The staff, especially the schedule lady I talked to first named Cortina, was so helpful! She was so sweet and caring. She was able to get me an appointment quickly with Dr Hancy. Dr Hancy is AMAZING! he's a hand specialist and seems to have done a fantastic job removing a rare glomus tumor from my finger, I'm still recovering. I had to drive 45-55min to this clinic but I didn't mind because the people were friendly, I didn't have to wait forever, and they seemed much more efficient that most doctors I've seen in Montgomery. I didn't feel discriminated against despite having Medicaid like another reviewer said. I would definitely recommend this place and feel lucky to have found it! And even luckier that they accepted my insurance!

name: Kimberly Bailey
text: Great practice. Everyone there made everything go smoothly. Everyone was very professinal & caring. I felt at ease in their care despite the pain from the fracture, pulled tendons & ligaments. I was petrified when I arrived & the pain was intense. Once I saw Luke Massey he put me at ease with his gentle nature. Joey & David were the greatest being gentle & making me smile despite everything. All of them were the greatest. Highly recommended if you find yourself in need :-) :-) :-)

name: Kate Craig
text: My mom waited three hours after her appointment time, before she actually saw a doctor.  He was putting on his coat to leave when he finally entered the room.  She had seen a doctor in California who had told her she could never work again, her shoulder was completely torn.  She was in so much pain she couldn't move.  This doctor, in all honesty, never even touched her shoulder.  He prescribed addictive opioids and told her to go back to work on Monday.  He didn't even examine her.  She requested a report from the office, so that she could give it to the next doctor she saw (she would never set foot in this office again) and it said all these things about how much movement, flexibility, etc. she had in her shoulder, as if he had examined her.  Again, he never even touched her.  Normally I would not write something like this, but I was appalled at how horribly these people would treat my lovely kind mother.  When my mom asked him about disability (again, she was in too much pain to move her arm, and my mom is *not* a complainer) he told her to go back to work, and if she couldn't do it because of the pain, to find a new job.  She pointed out that if she did that she would lose her health insurance, and he just shrugged.  So, that was our experience.  Because of this doctor, my mom moved again to be with my sister in Colorado, to find a doctor who actually cares about their patients.

name: Cheryl Cooks
text: Dr. Ryan Palmer and Miss McKenzie are an outstanding team!! I just fell in love with their spirit my very first visit. Awesome staff

name: Chennan Xue
text: Dr. Hancy is nice and knowledgeable! Staffs there are friendly and helpful!

name: Rebecca Baker
text: Well so far the WAIT is over an hour!

name: Donnell Anderson
text: Look no further and do not hesitate to go here for your therapy needs.  I worked specifically with Jordan and Brandon and they are simply amazing!  I hurt my back and could barely stand for 5 minutes at a time without feeling like my legs were going to drop out from under me.  I was able to get in the very next day for an assessment, Jordan was able to ease my pain some the first day.  We worked together on exercises for home and I continued to make progress and eliminate pain as the days passed by.  Brandon helped me fine tune my exercises and show me the proper way to use my back, strengthen my muscles, not to be intimidated  by certain movements and that I CAN do more than what I think.  I haven't been this pleased with the professionalism, kindness, compassion and concern from not only these two guys, but all of the staff.  I will go here again should I need their services in the future.  I feel great and I'm so thankful for Jordan and Brandon.   I know more and will continue to make better lifestyle changes from here on out.  Thank you Results Physiotherapy of Huntsville, a day without pain is a fantastic day!

resp.text: Thank you, our mission is to help people so they can get better, faster!

name: Hannah Lansdell
text: I finished my last appointment today, and I feel so much better! I will miss Zack, Brandon, and the rest of the Results Physiotherapy family. They made every appointment enjoyable and fun. If I ever need pt again I won't use anyone else!

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review. We work hard to satisfy expectations, and we're happy to hear when we help others get better, faster!

name: Noriluz Martinez
text: Loved the experience. Had been struggling for years with migraines and thanks to the therapy that I received and the professional attention I received from everyone at Results PT my migraines were reduced to a minimum and now I can say that my life is back to normal. Thanks to my PT Jordan and PTA Brandon you guys were fantastic, caring and very professional. Thank you Results PT! You guys made me feel like family. Even during these hard times and thank you for helping me feel so much better, faster.

name: DeWayne Robinson
text: The staff at Results Physiotherapy are fantastic. Brendon my therapist took his time, but was thorough in helping get back on my feet. Some of the exercises were tough, but they help me get the desired effect. Being pain free. I would recommend Results Physiotherapy to anyone that is experiencing pain from surgery or a accident to go to Results Physiotherapy. They will treat you like family

resp.text: Thanks for the review! We continually strive to help people get back to living life pain free!

name: Debbie Lipscomb
text: Bo/Bruce Brawner and his team are the best! The entire staff is professional and personable. Their office is welcoming, caring, and accommodating. It is truly teamwork among the therapists as they work to help their patients reach (and surpass) their goals. Going three times a week after a total knee replacement, I felt as if they were my family, and it was bittersweet when I was discharged. The therapy is tailored to each person, and the skilled therapists are quick to modify their plans if something doesn’t work. I highly recommend Results Physiotherapy without any reservations.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We always try to help others get back to living without pain; so they can do the things they love!

text: My visits to Results Physiotherapy Huntsville, Alabama was very good. The care I received from the therapist was thorough and focused on my ailment. The service was very professional and helpful and I felt that my welfare was their main concern. I would highly recommend physical therapy care.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review. We work hard to satisfy expectations, and we’re happy to hear when we help others get better, faster!

name: Sherry Miller
text:
I've had such great "results" at Results Physiotherapy. Bo Brawner resolved my hip and chronic back pain through a combination of manual physical therapy, stretches focused on relieving pain, and strengthening exercises. No other treatments (including physical therapy at other companies) had even begun to help with the chronic back pain.  I did my part faithfully, too - the home exercises and stretches as prescribed - they were key in the rehabilitation. But Bo's knowledge is incredible. He will continue trying different techniques until he finds the right combination of things that work.
The entire staff is great. They're always friendly and have great attitudes. I highly recommend Results PT.

resp.text: Thank you, our mission is to help people so they can get better, faster!

name: Carmen Moyers
text: The office is clean, well organized, with very nice staff. However my treatment plan wasn't successful. After 2 months my therapist had another therapist evaluate me and his prescription was the exact opposite of what I had been doing for the first 8 weeks. The new exercise prescription (supported by a second opinion)  is working much better. Just unfortunate it took 14 visits over 8 weeks ($$$) before things were changed.

resp.text: Thank you for providing feedback and letting us know about this issue. We would love for you to email wecare@resultspt.com to discuss further.

name: Bobby Guffey
text: Going to physical therapy usually means something hurts and its about to hurt more. A few months after retiring from the Army as a Helicopter pilot, I started getting headaches that made me physically ill. During the later years of my retirement, the headaches initially started. I wrote them off as exposure to fun=mes and loud noises. I 'm sure it didn't help matters v=but these new headaches couldn't be controlled with anything over the counter. So an MRI, I was told I may have Multiple Sclerosis. hundred's of pills later, I was about to give up. One of the side effects of the migraines had been severe stiffness in my neck and shooting pain. So after a few more trips in the MRI tube, They found nerve damage and herniated discs. Years of flying and poor posture got me. So the team went to work at Results Physiotherapy and almost entirely eliminated my headaches, plus allowing me to completely stop taking one medication and only occasionally take one more. This was 13 pills a week I no longer needed. I love this place and wouldn't go anywhere else

resp.text: Thanks for the review! We continually strive to help people get back to living life pain free!

You still do work but the therapists do a lot of manipulation work as well, helping your body to get back to where it needs to be faster and with longer lasting results, especially if you so the at home exercises.

text: I called ahead and set up an appointment and came in on my scheduled day and did a bit of computer stuff and went on my way to get seen. They were knowledgeable about what I was going through and setup treatment. I received relief almost instantly! I would highly recommend this place if you're in pain.

name: Ms. B
text:
Initially, my physician recommended me to a Physical Therapy establishment in Montgomery, AL for a knee injury that was sustained due to an accident.

After 5 weeks of PT at the initial establishment that was referred by my Dr., I had no change in my knee injury.

I was still in constant pain when walking, climbing stairs, prolonged standing, etc.

I thought that my mobility could not be fixed.

When I followed up with my Dr., I explained to him that I was still in pain and my mobility had not improved at all after my first round of PT with the initial establishment that was recommended.

I explained to him that I would like another round of PT but this time with Hart and Spine. My physician stated, “You’re unlikely to respond to PT a second time since it didn’t work for you the first time. “ I stated to him, “I’d still like to have one more round of PT with Hart and Spine.”

After one week and two sessions of PT with Tyson at Hart and Spine, my knee feels amazing. I can walk up stairs pain free, I can stand for long periods of time like I did before my injury. I can exercise and jog a little too. Also, I’ve seen all of the Chiropractors at Hart and Spine for my back and neck and they are all great at what they do as well. Drs. Hart, McMillian and Weber are the best in my opinion. Also, they learn your name during the first visit. Dale is an awesome tech and makes you feel right at home. The ladies and gentlemen at the front desk are ALWAYS nice and professional as well. Overall this establishment is a great place if you are in need of good Chiropractic and PT care.

name: LaDonna Patton
text: Professional, knowledgeable staff. Quick appointment scheduling. Available appointments later on some days. On-time appointments. Use of modern technology for checking in. Providers who LISTEN to help get the relief you need. What else do you need? Both my husband & I use this practice. Highly recommend.
